cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each bitbucket instance.

host-volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting Bitbucket data. The final location will be derived from this value plus the name set in `name` (e.g. `/mnt/host_volume/bitbucket`). Note that this path must be the same on all DCOS agents.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each bitbucket task.

role.description: Deploy bitbucket only on nodes with this role.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.
